note.p: Birth: Maureilhan, near Beziers, France (13 or 24 April 1794)
Death: Montgeron, near Paris, France (05 or 08 December 1867)
Research Field: Physiology, history of science
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1869-1870 vol 18 pp xxvii-xxviii
Notes: DSB gives birth and death dates as 13 Apr 1794 and 8 December 1867; certificate headed 'Read May 7th 1835'
